Header.title: COINAGE
Header.paragraph: THE FASTEST CRYPTOCURRENCY FOR GLOBAL PAYMENTS USING SCRYPT ALGORITHM ON BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY.

About.paragraph: Coinage is a peer-to-peer Internet currency that enables instant, near-zero cost payments to anyone in the world. Coinage is an open-source, global payment network that is fully decentralized without any central authorities. Mathematics secures the network and empowers individuals to control their own finances. Coinage features faster transaction confirmation times and improved storage efficiency than the leading math-based currency. With substantial industry support, trade volume, and liquidity, Coinage is a proven medium of commerce complementary to Bitcoin.
About.paragraph01: Coinage is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency created by [shahed], a software engineer. It was launched at beginning of this year 2022. The cryptocurrency was created based on the Bitcoin protocol, but it differs in terms of the hashing algorithm used, hard cap, block transaction times, Halving, Mining reward, and a few other aspects.

Services.name: Community
Services.text: Find support across a growing number of Coinage communities:
Services.title: Coinage Forum

Services.name: Resources
Services.text: Up-to-date network statistics can be found at Coinage Block Explorer Charts. Coinage offers free technical courses to learn and build  Blockchain and Cryptocurrency in Full-Stack Edition projects, which can be found here on GitHub.
Services.title: Coinage Explorer

Services.name: Open Source Software
Services.text: Coinage is an open source software project released under the MIT/X11 license which gives you the power to run, modify, and copy the software and to distribute, at your option, modified copies of the software. The software is released in a transparent process that allows for independent verification of binaries and their corresponding source code.

Services.name: Blockchain
Services.text: The Coinage blockchain is capable of handling higher transaction volume than its counterpart - Bitcoin. Due to more frequent block generation, the network supports more transactions without a need to modify the software in the future. As a result, Any global payment transaction confirmation can achieve within 1 minute.

Services.name: Wallet Encryption
Services.text: Wallet encryption allows you to secure your wallet, so that you can view transactions and your account balance, but are required to enter your password before spending coinage. This provides protection from wallet-stealing viruses and trojans as well as a sanity check before sending payments.

Services.name: Mining Reward
Services.text: Miners are currently awarded with 100 new coinages per block, an amount which gets halved roughly every 2 years (every 1051200 blocks). The coinage network is therefore scheduled to produce 850 million coinages.
